#

```



## 



### Git

** Git  `git add` **
**`git add`  `git commit` **
****



****

- 
- 
  - 

```shell

# 
$ git add ./readme.md

# 
$ git commit -m "complete the first function"    # -m : 
 
----------------------
 	#  -m vim
 	# vim Esc + :Wp     # w p
 	# Esc + :p
 	
##**************************************************************************
 	
# 
$ git add --all
$ git add .
$ git add ./	# 

# 
$ git commit --all -m ""        # --all : 
# 

# commit commit
# commit
$ git commit --amend -m [message]

# commit
$ git commit --amend [file1] [file2] ...
```



###  

```bash

# 
$ git rm [file1] [file2] ...

# 
$ git rm --cached [file]

# 
$ git mv [file-original] [file-renamed]

```



### 

```bash

$ git status

# Changes not staged for commit
# modified   =>  

# Changes to be committed
# modified   =>  

# nothing to commit, working tree clean  ==> 

```



### 

``` shell

# 
$ git log   

# 
$ git log --oneline

# **************************************************

#  less 

# 
$ git reflog

```



### 

```shell
$ gitk 
```



### 

```bash
# 
$ git checkout [file]

# commit
$ git checkout [commit] [file]

# 
$ git checkout .

# commit
$ git reset [file]

# commit
$ git reset --hard

# commit
$ git reset [commit]

# HEADcommitcommit
$ git reset --hard [commit]

# ex-----------------------------------------
$ git reset --hard Head~0    # Head~0   
							 # Head~1   
							 
							 # hard     
							 
# 
$ git reset --hard b0750f9   ## b0750f9 
# -------------------------------------------

# HEADcommit
$ git reset --keep [commit]

# commitcommit
# 
$ git revert [commit]

# 
$ git stash
$ git stash pop
```



##   master



### 

 git master

```shell

# 
$ git branch

# 
$ git branch [branch-name]

# 
$ git checkout -b [branch]

# 
$ git checkout [branch-name]

# 
$ git checkout -

#    
$ git merge [branch]

# ()
$ git branch -d [branch-name]

```

    "paths": {
        "linux": [],

```



**FILE HEADER** 

```json

## 1.
        
{
    "Default":
   {
       "email": "657829956@qq.com",
       "last_modified_by": "answer-zf",
       "author": "answe-zf"
   }


## 2.

## 	2.1

	C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\Sublime Text 3\
    Packages\FileHeader\template\header
    
## 	2.2html

    <!--
    * @Author: {{author}}
    * @Date:   {{create_time}}
    * @Last Modified by:   {{last_modified_by}}
    * @Last Modified time: {{last_modified_time}}
    * @E-mail: {{email}}
    -->

```



## 

``` json

[
    //
    //--codeformatter
    {
        "keys": ["shift+alt+f"],
        "command": "code_formatter"
    },
    //--htmlprettify
    {
        "keys": ["alt+shift+h"],
        "command": "htmlprettify"
    },
    //--jsFormat
    {
        "keys": ["shift+alt+j"],
        "command": "js_format",
        "context": [{
            "key": "selector",
            "operator": "equal",
            "operand": "source.js,source.json"
        }]
    },
    //chorme ()    
    {
        "keys": ["f2"],
        "command": "side_bar_files_open_with",
        "args": {
            "paths": [],
            "application": "C:\\Users\\Administrator\\AppData\\Local\\Google\\Chrome\\Application\\chrome.exe",
            "extensions": ".*"
        }
    },
    //SublimeLinter
    //--Lint this view
    {
        "keys": ["ctrl+k", "ctrl+l"],
        "command": "sublime_linter_lint"
    },
    //--Show all errors
    {
        "keys": ["ctrl+k", "ctrl+e"],
        "command": "sublime_linter_panel_toggle"
    },
    //Alignment
    {
        "keys": ["alt+shift+e"],
        "command": "alignment"
    }
]

```



## 



## 

```json

//
"font_face": "Fira Code"

## 
-- Consolas
-- Fira Code
-- Source Code Pro
```

```js

var http = require('http')
var fs = require('fs')
http
  .createServer(function(req, res) {
    var url = req.url
    if (url === '/') {
      fs.readFile('./view/index.html', function(err, data) {
        if (err) {
          res.end('404 Not Found')
          return
        }
        res.end(data)
      })
    } else if (url.indexOf('/public/') === 0) {   // public 
      fs.readFile('.' + url, function(err, data) {
        if (err) {
          res.end('404 Not Found')
          return
        }
        res.end(data)
      })
    }
  })
  .listen(3000, function() {
    console.log('Server is running')
  })

```

#### Promise

- Promise  -  

```js

var fs = require('fs')
// promise
// 

//  Promise 
// Promise 
var p1 = new Promise(function(resolve, reject) {
  fs.readFile('./data/a.txt', 'utf8', function(err, data) {  ## 
    if (err) {
      // 
      // console.log(err)
      //  Pending  rejected
      //  reject  then 
      reject(err)  ## 
    } else {
      // 
      // console.log(data)
      //  Pending  resolved
      //  resolve  then function
      resolve(data)  ## 
    }
  })
})

//  p1  then 
// then  function  resolve

```js

var fs = require('fs')

function pReadFile(filePath) {
  return new Promise(function(resolve, reject) {
    fs.readFile(filePath, 'utf8', function(err, data) {
      if (err) {
        reject(err)
      } else {
        resolve(data)
      }
    })
  })
}
pReadFile('./data/a.txt')
  .then(function(data) {
    console.log(data)
    return pReadFile('./data/b.txt')
  })
  .then(function(data) {
    console.log(data)
    return pReadFile('./data/c.txt')
  })
  .then(function(data) {
    console.log(data)
  })

```
